## Block.isValid() method

Is the block in a valid state

**Signature:**

```typescript
isValid(field: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field to check the validity for. |

**Returns:**

boolean

A boolean indicating whether the block is in a valid state for the specified field.
